column1: Mednogorsk (Russian: Медного́рск) is a town in Orenburg Oblast
Settlements at the area were founded in 1933 and the town status was granted in 1939.
Within the framework of administrative divisions
column4: incorporated as the Town of Mednogorsk—an administrative unit with the status equal to that of the districts. As a municipal division
column5: the Town of Mednogorsk is incorporated as Mednogorsk Urban Okrug.
